2435 a class of dynam memori alloc algorithm anew dynam memori alloc algorithm the fibonacci system is introduc thi algorithm is similar to but seem to have certain advantag over the buddi system a gener is mention which includ both of these system as special case cacm octob 1973 hirschberg d s dynam storag alloc buddi system simul fibonacci fragment 3 89 4 32 4 39 ca731005 jb januari 20 1978 11 38 am 1389 4 2435 1552 4 2435 2162 4 2435 2435 4 2435 2596 4 2435 2768 4 2435 2845 4 2435 2902 4 2435 2955 4 2435 1184 5 2435 2435 5 2435 2435 5 2435 2435 5 2435 2596 5 2435 2747 5 2435 2768 5 2435 2845 5 2435 2902 5 2435 2911 5 2435 2955 5 2435 1051 6 2435 1062 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1184 6 2435 1211 6 2435 1552 6 2435 1879 6 2435 1879 6 2435 1879 6 2435 273 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2435 6 2435 2498 6 2435 2596 6 2435 2596 6 2435 2598 6 2435 2734 6 2435 2734 6 2435 2736 6 2435 2747 6 2435 2747 6 2435 2747 6 2435 2768 6 2435 2768 6 2435 2773 6 2435 2773 6 2435 2983 6 2435
